{{Wired embedded system |brand=SiliconDust |model=HDHomeRun Prime |revision=(HDHR3-CC) |upc=094922034083 |ean= |asin=B004HKIB6E |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=network CableCARD tuner |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP7150U;IP7150U, 20EN1121AA; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1655DXCI-10G |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162FFR-S6C |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, PCMCIA |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211CL;REALTEK, RTL8211CL, B3J90QT, GB25, TAIWAN; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:18:DD }} [http://www.silicondust.com/products/models/hdhr3-cc/ Product page] :[http://www.silicondust.com/products/hdhomerun/prime/ '''Prime''' family page] :[http://www.silicondust.com/support/hdhomerun/downloads/ Downloads]
This device has '''[[Digtal TV (CableCARD) tuner num::3]]''' CableCARD tuners.
==Additional external links== *[http://connecteddigitalworld.com/2011/01/07/ces-2011-silicondust-hdhomerun-prime-dual-and-mac-tuners/ ''CES 2011 SiliconDust HDHomeRun PRIME, Dual and MAC Tuners'' on '''Connected Digital World'''] (board shot) :"HDHR3-CC", "REV 1.6", and "1430000-03 LF" is silkscreened on the board. :'''Macronix''' Flash, '''Realtek''' PHY
==Vendor links== *[http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16815345006 On '''Newegg''']
